Package org.wonderly.jini.serviceui

Interface Summary
PropertiesAccess This interface defines the methods needed to get, set and describe the set of properties that a service wants to export for administration.
PropertyValueManager This class provides a level of indirection for property value management.
RemoteAdministrable Services using PersistentJiniService, and wanting to be administrable, can implement this interface so that they get a Remote tagged interface that will cause rmic to export the correct methods into the proxy.
 

Class Summary
AdminDescriptor This class provides the UIDescriptor for getting a complete AdminUI that includes recognition of all JiniAdmins and PropertiesAccess implementations.
AdminUIJFrameFactory The class should be passed to the UIDescriptor constructor, in a MarshalledObject.
AdminUIManager This is a convenience class that will create a complete administrative component for a Jini service that implements Administrable.
AttributesAdminUI Provides a UI Component for JoinAdmin implementations to manage the Entry values configured for the service.
DestroyAdminUI Provides a UI Component for DestroyAdmin implementations.
DiscoveryGroupsAdminUI Provides a UI Component for DiscoveryAdmin implementations to manage the discovery groups configured for the service.
JoinGroupsAdminUI Provides a UI Component for JoinAdmin implementations to manage the join groups configured for the service.
LookupLocatorsAdminUI Provides a UI Component for JoinAdmin implementations to manage the LookupLocator instances configured for the service.
PropertiesUIDemo This is a demonstration service.
PropertyAdminDelegate Property setting via remote method calls that use introspection would require the class hierachy of the existing service to be altered, without some form of delegation.
PropertyAdminDescriptor This class is the UIDescriptor definition that will provide only a properties based AdminUI.
PropertyAdminUIJFrameFactory The class should be passed to the UIDescriptor constructor, in a MarshalledObject.
PropertyDescriptorImpl This class encapsulates the description of a property.
ServiceUIFactory This is a base class for all ServiceUI Factories.
StorageLocationAdminUI Provides a UI Component for the StorageLocationAdmin interface
UIJPanel This is a convenience subclass for all the UI Components implemented in this package.
UIJPanel.RemoteAction Inner class that provides a simple layer for deferring common Exception handling to the convenience methods in this class
VectorListModel<T> This is an extension of the AbstractListModel that uses a vector, like default list model, but allows direct access to the vect reference so that you can simply do setContents(Vector<T>) to change the model data.
 

Exception Summary
RemovedPropertyException This exception can be thrown by an overridden getXXX method to cause the associated property to disappear from the list that the user sees.
